title: 95/214/EC: Commission Decision of 16 June 1995 amending for the third time Decision 94/462/EC concerning certain protection measures relating to classical swine fever in Germany and repealing Decision 94/178/EC
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 16 June  1995 amending for the third time Decision 94/462/EC concerning certain protection measures relating  to classical swine fever in Germany and repealing Decision 94/178/EC (Text with EEA relevance)  (95/214/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Member States shall amend the measures which they apply to trade so as to bring  them into compliance with this Decision. They shall immediately inform the Commission thereof.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 June 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
